directions: Marinate lamb steaks in soy sauce seasoned with chopped garlic and grated ginger. Let the meat stand in this mixture for 5 to 6 hours and turn it often. Grill as for lamb steaks , brushing with the marinade during cooking. Omit salt and pepper.
Serve with fried rice and broiled pineapple fingers.
ingredients: lamb steaks cut about 1 1/2 inches thick
title: Oriental Lamb Steaks
